text: The men's individual cross country event was part of the track and field athletics programme at the 1920 Summer Olympics. It was the second appearance of this event. The competition was held on Monday, August 23, 1920. Forty- seven runners from 12 nations competed. ==Results== The first three runners for each nation to finish in this event were also counted towards the cross country team result. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !
